content.detailedDescription: I woke up suddenly at 1:58 am on 02/08/06. went onto the 3rd story balcony of my apartment. saw very bright object with pulsating green, orange, white and blue lights, right above trees but as far up as a low flying airplane in the western sky. seemed to be hovering. got bigger, then smaller. watched it for about 40 minutes. filmed it for over 6 minutes with a mustek 4.0 mega pixel digital camera. saw smaller, star-like object to the right of this object, left of the moon but was unable to get it on film. night was clear with very few, whispy clouds. the object asecended into western sky until it was as small as a small star, with lights still pulsating.
content.summary: Bright object in western sky

content.detailedDescription:
Saw something again for about 40 min. (continually) between 5:35 - 6:15 am. i was driving my husband to work, driving east. we both spotted something very bright in the eastern sky. it was extremely bright, but this time it looked much closer. we both kept expecting it to turn, or something because we both thought it had to be a plane because of it's low proximaty in the sky, but it was much brighter than plane, and it looked round or diamond shaped. then all of a sudden, it started to pulsate in different colors, alternating from white, yellow, blue and green - no red (like a plane). as we got closer to his job (about a 35-45 min drive from my home), i started to become very anxious because it seemed to be getting bigger and closer to us. honestly, i was scared because it looked just like the one i watched yesterday. i felt like it was "watching" us. my husband is a total skeptic, but he was even concerened. i was so scared i began to pray and then suddenly it looked like it was getting smaller and more like a star, but still visible and still super bright.
 
this thing was at least twice the size of any visable planet and at least 3 times brighter. it was so bright that you could see the surrounding rays of light from it, similar to when you look at the sun directly, except it didn't hurt your eyes.
content.summary: Bright light in eastern sky

content.detailedDescription:
I live in chula vista, california, a suburb of san diego, california. i woke up suddenly at 1:32 a.M. on 02/06/06. i decided to go onto my apartment balcony, which faces west, to have a cigarette. the sky was clear, with few, scattered stratus clouds. i noticed a large, bright light in the western sky, which i first thought was an airplane, but could not hear any sound. i then noticed the unusual colors emanating from it: red, green, blue yellow and white. it was extremely bright, brighter than any stars i could see, and it looked as if it were pulsating. i waited to see if it would turn north or south, like the planes in the area usually do, but it did not. it continued into the western sky, climbing higher into the sky. i felt as if i were paralyzed; i could not stop staring at it. then i noticed it move left, then right, in a perfect, straight line. i thought i was crazy. i decided to use a tree as a "marker" to to see if it were really moving like that, so i moved my head so the object was just to the left of a tree located about 50 yards in front of me and 3 stories down. the object moved again, then back. i looked at the surrounding sky and noticed a smaller, star-like object to the north of this object, but with the same probing lights, heading westward as well, very high in the sky. so high that it looked like a small star, but moving very fast. 
 
i sat and watched these objects until they were completely out of view, because for some reason, i felt uncomfortable going back in my apartment until these things were gone. when i could no longer see them, i went back inside. it was 2:26 a.M. i stood perplexed and wondered if these things were planes, how would i be able to sit and watch their ascent for almost an hour?! i am still puzzled. i tried to film them, but my camera could not pick up the image.
 
i have had other sightings and do have some pics of past sightings, if interested.
thank you,
jennifer f.
chula vista, ca
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Large, extremely bright light in center with pulsating lights

content.detailedDescription: I was driving from home menahga mn.To the twin citys for work when i was about 10 miles i seen a big bright light looked like a meter coming staight down.I was waiting for it to hit in the feild when it stopped and went up about 200 feet and hovered there.The shape was a diamond in the inside and a circle of lights around it.As i keept heading south to the citys it stayed in front of me getting further away but only a couple of blocks this thing was the size of the metrodome.It stayed in the sky the whole time of my drive.Not a star or planet or plane i seen it come down stop before hitting the ground.Moving way to fast for anything we have.Then my cell phone rang it fianc'e she asked if i seen the metor,i said its not no metor i still see it, it stopped before hitting the ground and is moving slowly in front of me.Which it did all the way to the citys but moving further away,a coworker seen it at 6:15.I can't believe it was'nt on tv or something.There was two other veicles at the time it came out of the sky i know they seen it to,they hit there brake lights.
content.summary: Driving to work huge light came shooting down from sky like a metor didn't hit ground

content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Three magenta spheres, full moon size, rose from horizon, made rt. angle turns south, stopped abruptly, then paced in the air, made another rt angle turn upward, shooting upward at incredible speed toward space leaving behind a cloud of the same color

content.detailedDescription: I was in a car, windows down, and i noticed two bright objects.I was just playing around when my head flinched forcing me to look out the window.At first i thought it was a big plane.But it stopped and went in reverse.Then it took off at an estimate of 800 miles per hour.It kept changing colors of white, to red, to blue, and back to white.My rection was freaking out.
content.summary: Changed colors, were two.

content.detailedDescription: Seen far from city lights.
content.summary: Strange sounds, and flashing lights of blue and yellow

content.detailedDescription:
While in the passenger's side seat of a car riding home from danville we passed through the v of the road that was cut through a hill. as we exited the south side of the v, i saw a darkened area in the sky where there were no stars shining. i then saw what appeared to be the flat bottom of a craft hovering just over the crest of the east side embankment. the botton of the craft had about eight lights of different colors ranging from red to yellow to orange.
  i said to the driver...O m g...Tell me you see what i am seeing. the driver followed my gaze and looked in the direction i was looking. he immediately jerked the steering wheel to the right hand shoulder of the road and we looked through the drivers side window and out the back window of the car. the object was gone. we never even discussed it between ourselves. we both, i suppose just felt it would probably be in our best interest to not tell anyone or even acknowledge it ever happened or people might think we were nuts!
content.summary: Multicolored lighted half sphere-like shaped craft less than 200 ft off ground

content.detailedDescription:
Hi,
one of the members of our photography group was taking lens testing pictures of san francisco from across the bay.  he reported getting pictures of the train that goes down embarcadero.  only there is no train that goes down embarcadero in sf.  we have taken a look at his images and can't figure out what it is.  can you guys please have a look and tell us?  the thread on our user group is here.
http://www.Soocool.Com/forum/viewtopic.Php?T=2325 and his shot sequence is here: http://sis24.Berkeley.Edu/view/images/train2-animate.Gif
larger individual images are here:
http://sis24.Berkeley.Edu/view/images/1024/

as you guys have a lot of experience explaining this stuff, please help us figure it out.

thanks in advance,
robert (robin) bourbonnais
content.summary: Train like progression of objects between san francisco and oakland

I had a unique property for 15 yrs and started having strange occourences 2.7 years ago although i think that it could hsve started earlyer

please view following pixs they should be high rez at least 1024 756 byt shood be 2500+ by 3500+ but for some strange reason some people dont recieve them that way please view at http://photos.Yahoo.Com/xca@verizon.Net

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home and waiting for my son to return from a high school baseball game out of town. he was way overdue. i became very anxious waiting for his arrival and went outside to look down the highway to see if i could see the school bus coming that he would be traveling in. i was trying to be patient and so i just let my eyes wander thru the neighbor, up and down the streets, and i soon caught something out of the corner of my. it was a small  red light flashing thru the trees across the street from where i lived. there was  a church there, and tall trees behind it.  at first i thought it must be a helicopter since the town i was in was situated between fort campbell and fort knox. i kept noticing the light and as it moved toward me, directly toward me, i still assumed it to be helicopter, until it came closed. it made no sound and seemed to be gliding. it continued to make it's way toward me,  with no noise and i became a little anxious. i had been standing in the grass but as it appeared to approach me directly overhead i stepped onto the sidewalk. the object appeared to stop and i looked up. could not be sure how big it was, did not appear to be very large but it was very to see the underside or what i assumed to be the underside. it had been green and red lights that were rotating clockwise all at once. the lights were very brilliant but not casting any light down from them. i assumed it was round because of the way the lights were situated but i can nver be sure the size of the object or the shape. i was a little breathless and i was almost excited but not unduly concerned. i think  iwas more curious than anything. i did however remember being almost froxen in place while the thing hung over my head. i went indoors and drew a picture with crayons of the description as well as i could and waited for my son to get home, which he did a short time later. i asked why the bus was so late and he told me there was engine trouble with the bus. i did not ask him to elaborate. i was just glad my son was home safe and sound.  the reason i am writing this is because it haunts me to this day. i have also have had some strange things happening to me in the past few years that i can't really explain away although they are not dramatic circumstances i still have no answers to them.
this event happened in logan county kentucky in the spring of 1979 or 1980.P.S. i do wish that i had had the foresight to have taken a picture. it would have been an eyeopener to all skeptics. i never notified the authorities. it don't think it would have served any purpose at that time.
content.summary: Slowly and silently glided over my head very low and stopped . then continued to glide offf ito the night.  i t was very discernible to see and not a fuzzy ight

content.detailedDescription: Iwas headed home from kenly n.C. on memorial ch. rd.I stopped at the stop sign connecting memorial ch. rd. and hwy.581.Iwas at a dead still postion when i noticed this huge bunched up multi colored lights just floating extremely low to the ground.Approximately,100f. or less.The lights were large.They bright,but not as bright as you would expect to be so low or so large.The air speed could be compared to that of aslow moving car.I realizied that the craft was nearly on top of me.Before it was directly above me,i turned on rt.Of 581 heading towards goldsboro,n.C.Im satisfied jn my mind that the craft turned and followed me.My road speed was 70-75 miles ph.The craft appeared to stay with .Reflecting back ,it seems that i was being toyed with.It appeared to syay side by side with me for about 5 miles.I remember thinking to myself that there speed had intentionally picked up as if the craft was watching me. i also remember thinking that i wised my young son was not with me.I found it to be exciting and scary at the same time.However,after about 5miles the craft appeared to head towards the goldsboro city area close to the afbase.Although, i had alot of crooks and turns i was able to almost catch up with it.It was'nt until i was on hwy.70 that i was able to see jets coming off the base making fly bys.I watch in amazement as the craft picked up speed and appeared to ascend fairly rapidly before it just flew in what was like the blink of a eye.I never planned on sharing this information for the obviuos reasons.But,here it is.
content.summary: Approximately 10-15 multi-colored lights .Shallow humming sound.Huge . extremely large.

content.detailedDescription:
1. my dad and i were staying in our motorhome in the hill country. we were sitting around a campfire discussing buying land in seguin. i had drank appx 5 beers (i was not impaired). he had none.
2. i noticed it when my dad exclaimed, "there it is!". as he had seen it on a previous occasion and i thought he had seen something else maybe. i looked and saw it and was quite taken aback.
3. i didn't know what it was as i exclaimed, "what the hell is that a couple times." i was very stunned. after seeing its maneuvers i thought i had seen something that defied laws of physics as i understand them. mainly that of intertia.
4. the object was tomohawk shaped in my opinion. it appeared to be dark. there were 5 lights in the front (the wide portion) and a larger light in the center of bottom of the craft. the lights were dimmly glowing not really putting off any light. (my vantage point was from underneath, to the side and back). it was perhaps 60-80 ft. wide and 6-8ft thick and 60-80 ft. long. it was hovering perfectly still appx 20 ft. above the edge of the trees and about 100 ft. away when we first noticed it. i had the feeling it had been there for a while possibly listening to us or waiting to see if we would notice it or something because it was so still when we first saw it. after it realized we saw it we heard a whoot whoot whoot sound. there was a slight acceleration and then in an instant it shot off very low (20 ft or so) over the trees out of our vision. it was very very fast, nearly instantly gone.
5. my initial reaction was that of utter shock. what i saw didn't compute at first. i was then in awe. i told my dad that just didn't make sense and he said, "i know thats what i was trying to tell you." i then drew a picture of it. i'm still amazed by it and have tried to find a picture of it on the net but the closest thing i have found is the "original" flying saucer.
6. it shot off over the trees (they are maybe 30 feet tall).
content.summary: My dad and i saw a silent hovering boomerang shape craft when we noticed it it made a whoop whoop whoop sound and shot off over the trees. we were very close.

content.detailedDescription:
Fewer than a handful of people know about my close encounter.  however, the event had such an impact upon me, that it still gives me cold chills whenever i think about it.  i thought it was time to pass on the information to someone who might be able to make heads or tails out of it.  at the time of the encounter, i lived with my wife in a little apartment just outside the city limits of salisbury, north carolina.  i was employed as art director at the corporate headquarters for pic 'n' pay shoe stores, located in charlotte.  i commuted back and forth to work, a distance of 50 miles one way.

i don't remember the exact date.  i do remember that it was sometime in early november 1977.  the day had been miserable, with a cold steady rain.  when i left work, it was already getting dark.  the drive home usually lasted about an hour in clear weather.  i knew the drive home in all the slop and rush-hour traffic was going to be a "bear!"

my apartment was located near an old, abandoned drive-in theatre off highway 601.  as i sat at the stoplight at the intersection of statesville boulevard and what is now known as north jake alexander boulevard, i noticed in the distance to my right what at first appeared to me to be "heat" lightning.  it struck me as being rather odd in that it was cold (mid-30s) and the flashes were different in color -- alternating among reds, yellows, blues, and greens.  then i thought that maybe something was going on at the old drive-in theatre, but as i drove along jake alexander, the area affected by the flashes seemed to be centered over the intersection of jake alexander and highway 601, just south of the old drive-in.

as i got closer to the intersection, i slowed down and rolled down the window slightly to try to pick up any thunder or any other kind of noise.  the only sounds were the wind pushing rain through the crack and the car's engine.  about 50 feet from the stop sign, i pulled my car over to the shoulder of the road and stopped.  the flashing was now directly over me.  i shut off the engine and listened.  there was nothing but brilliant flashes of different colors followed only by wind and rain.  i was dumbfounded.  as the clouds were very low, i could not make out any distinct shape -- only glowing clouds alternating colors.  it made absolutely no sense.  i remember at the time several vehicles coming up beside me over the next few minutes as they stopped for the stop sign.  each time i would roll down my window enough to get my left arm out and point straight up at the clouds.  no response.

i must have sat there riveted to my seat, watching the greatest, noiseless light show i had ever witnessed.  the colors seemed to dance all over the place above me, in no particular order or sequence.  i thought to myself, "i have got to share this with someone!"  i started the car and turned right towards my apartment.  if anyone would believe me, my wife would.  or so i thought.  i bounded through the door like a kid at christmas, telling my perplexed wife about what i had just seen.  you would have thought i had lobsters coming out of my ears as she just looked and stared.  and though i pleaded with her to grab a coat and follow me back to the car, she said there was no way in hell that she was going out in a cold rain to look at flashes of light.

i practically dove back through the door and headed the car back towards the intersection.  however, the lightshow had gone.  there was nothing in its place but darkness and the tiny glow from the flashing intersection light.

well, that's it.  i wish i had more to tell, but that's the extent of my story.  i will tell you this though, the event had a tremendous impact upon my life and how i have looked at the world ever since.
content.summary: There was really no distinct shape, just flashes of different colored lights in the low-hanging clouds.  and, except for the wind and the rain, absolutely no other sound.

content.detailedDescription: I was out at my mom's house to take her some groceries i picked up for her. she lives in the country and the stars are very bright.  as i was looking up at the sky, admiring the view, i noticed a far-away object that at first i thought was a star, but then noticed it kept changing color.  then i noticed it moving funny - in short little straight lines and stopping - moving back and forth in short little spurts and stopping to pause after most of the movements.  sometimes it would go over and then up and down, but it usually went one direction and then stopped.  when i noticed it, it was about at "10:00 o'clock" position in east.  ( straight up being 12:00) however, it moved very slowly to the south until by 10:00 pm it was almost due south at roughly the same distance from the horizon.  my mom saw it, and when i came home, i pointed it out to my two children and one grandchild.  we watched it for awhile, but soon decided it wasn't going to do anything more and ceased watching about 10:00 pm. i think it must have been some sort of weather satellite or something but the movement is what really baffles me.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright object that turned red, blue, green, yellow

content.detailedDescription: I was outside, on my balcony of my house in orfu, hungary. i was playing around with my digital camera and took a picture of the moon. at the time i did not notice anything in the sky. just the other day i was looking over my pictures to see which ones i should delete to make room on my hard drive. i came to this picture, i zoomed in and noticed the objects in the air. i'm not sure what it is, but i thought i would send it to your office. you have more experience with these types of things. i will send the original picture i took.
content.summary: Discoverd an "object" on a picture.

content.detailedDescription:
Out 2-3am 3miles south of city lights in farm land. trying my new orion scope. no sound but windy bright moon & stars. the ufo? came from the west over me to the east. no sound very low to ground. this is the 1st time i have told anyone other than my wife. i was alone & i also just sent this info to coast to coast but i don't know if there interested. i don't take drugs & i'm very open to anything.

derreck
content.summary: A wing with green red blue repeating left to right lights/no sound/low to ground

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on rt 130 and bridgeboro rd on a clear night around 6:00pm and i saw in front of me to the left through my windshield up in the sky at an unknown distance, 3 orange spheres of light in a horizontal row, just floating there for about 10 seconds and then they dissapeard 1 by 1 in a row and i did not see them after that.   i tried to turn down a road to see if i could see what it was and i did not find anything in the sky at all.
content.summary: 3 orange orbs in a row and they disappeared one by one in a row about 1 second apart

content.detailedDescription: We had just gotten out of work and we were walking down a boardwalk just after dusk looking toward the tampa international airport about six miles away from it.  we were actually discussing a u.F.O experience when i looked up and noticed a light hovering in the distance but not too far away.  to answer all of the non-believers and liars:  it was not an electomagnetic force from under us; it was not a plane or helicopter or saturn or whatever else excuse you can make up this time.  you should notice at this point that i am quite verbose or at least affluent in language and therefore thought and assumption or assertion of unusual occurrences. so the object hovered for a brief time, then moved left, then right, then up then down, then at an unusual speed progessed to the south faster than any human body could adjust to or handle.  so:  a copy of a crashed craft?  there is more here than that because of the speed.  that's all, drew.
content.summary: This object appeared to be a conventional light, no different than a plane or helicopter.  as soon as we can figure out how an object travels at 12 g's we will understand this one.

content.detailedDescription: At 10:30 pm i was sitting on my balcony, smoking a cigarette. just happened to look up and noticed a boomerang shaped object heading south.  there were no lights and no sound coming from it. it did reflect light though which was why i noticed it.  at first i thought it was a stealth jet, then realized that it was too wide and not shaped quite right for that.  i lost sight of it as it went over the top of the house.  i just went in, jotted it all down in my journal and went to bed.  didn't report it soner because i don't want to be considered one of the looney people.
content.summary: Lookd up and noticed a boomerang shaped object, no lights, no sound

content.detailedDescription: At 10:30 pm i was sitting on my balcony, smoking a cigarette. just happened to look up and noticed a boomerang shaped object heading south.  there were no lights and no sound coming from it. it did reflect light though which was why i noticed it.  at first i thought it was a stealth jet, then realized that it was too wide and not shaped quite right for that.  i lost sight of it as it went over the top of the house.  i just went in, jotted it all down in my journal and went to bed.  didn't report it soner because i don't want to be considered one of the looney people.
content.summary: Lookd up and noticed a boomerang shaped object, no lights, no sound

content.detailedDescription: I was fishing from the 7 miles bridge facing west. the night was rainy and windy, all other fishermen left because of the weather except my buddy and a chinese couple on their honeymoon from new york.  at 11.20pm i quit fishing because there was nothing biting and turn around facing the highway and then there it was, my buddy told me to turn around and watch. it was an orange plate, stood there for exactly three minutes  and then it flew south and stopped again and there is where i starte getting nervous.  the chinese couple left right away and the ufo then started dropping what appeared to me attime to be rectangular plates that went right into de sea crisscrossing each one maybe it was about a mile from where we were  it was   what appeared to me.  two days later a radio commentator here in miami, announced that the cubanair force was in pursuit of two ufos around havana for several hours the same night i am talking about  . my buddy never went fishing to that area.  yours very truly  placido bouza
content.summary: Round, flat light orange

content.detailedDescription:
It was exactly 7-45 pm and i was parking my van at the side of my house in the drive.Oposite my property entrance were three local youngsters,"look at the ufo" one said.I turned and looked into the dark sky and i was amazed by the glowing light emiting from this odject.It appeared to be stationary at a hight of what looked like 500 to 700 feet some mile and a half away.My response was,"its a helicopter probably the police abserving the trafic on the bypass" the three young chaps all afixed by this said it had been ther for ages. i went indoors and unpacked my lunch bag and decided to look again.It was absolutly statioary,i quickly dismissed the helicopter theory as it was not wavering or moving at all,it was fairly breezy and the pilot even the best would have had to make some movement to keep its possition.
   i then returned indoors and got out the camcorder and set up a tripod on the upstairs rear bedroom window ledge.
it was now starting to move very slowly south easterly and rising in the sky. the light it was emitting seemed to be contained within a circular orb changing colour and intensity.When i zoomed in i colud clearly depict a sold looking horizontal mass at about two thirds from the bottom of the ball like mass.My tripod is the cheapest crap tripod anyone could heve and i was having dificulty in tracking the object as my movements were too jerky.I found if i tapped the tripod slightly i was able to keep fixed on the object better.So on the video i shot the object is reasonably stable untill i try to re-focus i filmed this for about a 1/4 hour before my battery went flat.I called my daughter who lives about a mile from me and she too went outside to observe.
since sighting this i have tried to get some more info but no one seems to take it seriously untill they see my film.
go to http://lookingout.Atspace.Com/ for four seperate single frame images.
content.summary: Bright  and iluminating orb like object.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside laying on the grass in front of my house looking at the stars. i caught view of a star that seemed different than the others. it seemed to have a more glowing light around it and the more i looked i could see some objects or lights coming from it. than it began to move slowly and than would speed up and than slow down. i started to realize that this was no star and the strangest part was that it seemed to change into different shapes. i thought i must be going crazy or perhaps that i was really stressed from just losing my job. i tried to rationalize it but it was there in the sky. i ran inside and i told my fiancee to hurry up and come outside and see this and tell me if i was crazy. i told him i didn't know what it was but it was almost hypnotizing and it changed forms. he came out and saw it and he saw it move and he remarked that it could be a sattelite but than it changed direction as he watched and he suddenly remarked that it wasn't any sattelite that he didn't know what it was. he didn't see the forms as i did but he saw it speed up and slow down and become stationary and change direction. he also saw the more glowing light around it. we are also in a flight pattern and have alot of planes in our vicinity but this was no plane. it was single light that could speed up and slow down and come to a dead stop. we watched for a while and my fiancee finally said he did know what it was. i continued to watch a little while longer until i lost sight of it. i've never seen anything like it before. the strangest part was the feeling i felt when i was watching it. i was like mystified by it. i just can't really describe that part at a chance that i'll sound completely off my rocker but i know what i saw.
content.summary: Looked like a star but seemed to changed shaped moved fast and slow and changed direction

content.detailedDescription:
As i was driving home from work going north on i-75 approximately 2-3 miles north of downtown dayton i saw three bright yellow stationary lights in the east. from my vantage point they appeared to be at a roughly 45 degree angle to the horizon. it looked like they were in an echelon formation and the first (most northern) light was smallest, the second larger and the third (most southern) was the largest giving the impression that they were not geometrically 'on-line' in regards to my direction of travel. furthermore, as i slowed my vehicle and peered (quite dangerously so) out my passenger side window i looked for flashing 'anti-collsion' lights that all known aircraft have and saw none on any of the lights. about 2 minutes into my observation i noticed the largest (closest?) of the lights moving off in a north easterly direction. the others remained stationary or nearly stationary. i followed the moving light (the biggest one) as it slowly moved ne and i began to lose sight of the other two. i decided to take the next exit ramp to get a better vantage point and when i did i momentarily lost sight of all three lights. when i regained a visual i saw a similar light but it had aircraft strobes and anti-collision lights on it and was going in nearly the opposite direction! the area i was now in was a valley and the surrounding buildings and trees obscured further viewing. i made the rest of the trip home without seeing the lights again.  

i am not one to make half-cocked assumptions and i've never seen a true ufo before. however, these lights intrigued me and i haven't stopped thinking about them since. what were they?

i forgot to mention that for the 6-7 minutes i viewed these lights, i traveled about 3 miles north on 75 and about .5 miles east on whatever exit road i took.

side note: we do have wright-pat close by but i'm a native daytonian and i am quite sure it was no airforce bird.
content.summary: I observed 3 distinct, yellowish lights in the eastern sky

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of december 9th, 1965, i was waiting in line to go to dinner (i was in a youth facility at the time) while waiting i looked up at the moon (which was on my left) the sky was clear, and while gazing i saw a small object come from what looked to be the left side of the moon. the object was small, but grew in size as it made it's way toward me. it had to be traveling quite fast, as it was right in front of me within less than a minute. the object was a huge fireball...It seemed to be quite low in the sky and moved pretty slow considering it's size. i would liken it to a jet as it comes in for a landing (the speed) the whole group of us were shouting and pointing and trying to figure out what we were seeing. most thought it was a meteor, some called it a 'falling star'. i was just in awe...I felt i witnessed something spectaculor and not a meteor! that was 41 years ago..I was 15 or 16 at the time, and i have never forgot what i saw...It wasn't until recently that i realized that i just might have witnessed what is now known as the 'kecksburg ufo' the memory of that evening is still clear in my mind. the object traveled from west to east (from where i was standing) the exact physical address i was at at the time was 499 belgrove drive, kearny new jersey (facing the passiac river towards newark new jersey) the object seemed to get slower and traveled until it was out of my line of sight.
content.summary: Object came from the left side of the moon.

content.detailedDescription: This was an incident that happened about 10 years ago or so.  my brother and i were camping up in the adirondacks in upstate new york, don't remember the exact location now but it was probably near the indian lake / pharoah lake areas.  it was around 11pm.  we had eaten dinner and were standing around the campfire.  we were camped on a penninsula on the lake.  it was a clear, calm night.  we then noticed a light coming over the tree tops in the distance probably a mile or so away.  we continued to watch it because we did not know what it was a plane, star, etc..  however, as we watched the light it came lower and closer to us until eventually it was just over the treeline and had reached the edge of the lake.  it was simply a small white light approximately the size of a basketball or so i would judge. silent.  when it reached the edge of the water it just stopped and to my eyes "blinked" away and it was gone.  my brother claims it shot up at an angle in a flash into the sky.  i did not see that, just that it blinked away. that was the end of the incident.
content.summary: Ball of light

content.detailedDescription: I was watching t.V. late at night when a tower next to me house started acting strange (i suspect the ufo was disrupting it) when i looked out the window to see what was happening i saw a bright light to low to be a star and wasn't being phased out by the city lights i first thought it might be a jumbojet or helicopter a few days earlier i had barrowed a friends digital camera so i dicided to snap a few picture as it started to move to my right while moveing up at the same time slow incline i snaped 3 pictures then continued to observe the object it looked like just a ball of light from far away but when i zoomed in on the picture i saw a dic like object with a dome on top it was a gun metal silver color i wasent surprised at this event at the time iv been obsever to many ufo sightings before this so if anything i was exited im a ufo hunter by trade i continued to watch the ufo until it got in the middle of an open patch of sky about 5 inches from where it started in the sky it flashed once and the a small streak of light can be seen in one of my photos (which have amazing clearity of the object) as the craft left the skys it appeared 2 days in a row and never returned a few days later i found a picture nasa had takin of a ufo near the moon and when i compared the two pictures they are identical.
content.summary: Silver disc ,20 ft tall, 30-40 ft wide, 4-6 miles away, 2 miles high, amazing speed

content.detailedDescription: I was goin nortth i think but i was going so fast and then it just stop like in one second, start going in circules and live so fast frme where it was comimg the first time and disapire.
content.summary: Small, with a shine withe light.
